equipment

Class Hardware

  • java.lang.Object
    • equipment.Equipment
      • equipment.Hardware
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Hardware
extends Equipment
    Hardware class. A hardware is an equipment with an operating system, a screen and a processor. initial code by: Marc Karassev; modified by: Marc Karassev
    Author:
    Marc Karassev
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hardware()
      Default constructor, constructs a new hardware with a 10" screen and unknown manufacturer, processor, operating system and model.
      Hardware(java.lang.String maker, double screenSize, Processor proc, OS os, Model model)
      Constructs a new hardware with the manufacturer, screen sire, processor, operating system and model.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OS getOs()
      Returns the hardware's operating system.
      Processor getProcessor()
      Returns the hardware's processor.
      java.lang.String getScreenSize()
      Returns the hardware's screen size in a string.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the hardware and its values.
